title: hotel puncak pas resort
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Puncak Pass Resort merupakan penginapan yang berdiri sudah lama dan termasuk penginapan tua, namun interior dan suasananya penginapan sudah di renovasi mengikuti perkembangan saat ini.

Lokasi nya terdapat di titik puncak pass-nya. 
Pertama kali masuk akan disambut dengan baik oleh satpam yang menjaga dan ditanya apakah mau ke hotel atau restoran. Karena penginapan ini dapat dikunjungi oleh umum juga bagi yang ingin menyantap di restoran tersebut.

Memasuki Lobby bernuansa pegunungan dengan interior kayu yang membuat kesan hangat. Saat itu di meja resepsionis tidak ada orang, jadi saya panggil petugasnya, kalau bisa ditambahin bell kecil buat manggil petugas.
Petugas menyapa dengan ramah, senyum dan proses check-in berjalan cukup cepat.

Saya mendapatkan 2 voucher breakfast, 2 voucher welcome drink (tea, coffee, bandrek, bajigur), 1 voucher discount 20% untuk restoran (for dine in / room service).

Saya menginap di hotel lantai 3, FYI untuk lobby termasuk dalam lantai 4 yaitu lantai paling atas, karena penginapan ini berdiri kearah bawah (lembah), jadi penginapan berada di bawah lobby. 

Kamar yang saya pesan adalah superior dengan king bed, ternyata kasurnya sangat besar dan kamar cukup luas dan terdapat balkon, lalu dilengkapi dengan Tv, sofa, mini bar, kulkas kecil, lemari, tentunya kamar mandi dengan hot water.

Pemandangannya bagus kearah lembah dan pegunungan. Namun kebetulan depan hotel dari balkon terlihat renovasi yang sedang berjalan karena pernah longsor di tahun 2018 (curah hujan tinggi), tapi penginapan ini masih tetap aman untuk liburan kok.

Sarapannya cukup variatif, dari bubur ayam yang enak, makanan westernnya, roti, kue, lontong sayur, nasi goreng, salad, omelete, cukup bikin saya dan suami kekenyangan di pagi hari. Pemandangan dari restoran saat sarapan keren bangeeet, suka banget. walaupun kena matahari, tapi udaranya sejuk dan enak banget.

Sekitar hotel terdapat vila juga ada tempat rusa, kelinci, ayam. Kita bisa kasih makan ke hewan-hewan tersebut. 

Walaupun udara di puncak tidak sedingin dulu, tapi di puncak pass ini masih dapat setidaknya suhu 18 derajat.

Room service untuk pembersihan kamar terbilang cukup cepat karena dilakukan 2 orang sekaligus jadi tidak perlu menunggu lama. 
Di hari Jumat penginapan ini juga mengadakan Sholat Jumat, jadi tidak perlu mencari masjid diluar penginapan.
title: Penginapan Cukup Memuaskan

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak/Ibu,

Kami sampaikan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya untuk telah memilih Puncak Pass Resort menjadi tempat berlibur dan menginap Bersama keluarga.

Kami senang bahwa Bapak/Ibu dan keluarga sangat menikmati masa berlibur di hotel kami yang memang secara alami telah dikelilingi pemandangan alam yang indah dan juga mendapatkan pelayanan yang ramah dan sigap dari staff kami.

Dengan senang hati, kami akan segera perhatikan dan tindaklanjuti Feedback yang sudah bapak/ibu sampaikan, saat ini kami sedang dalam rencana untuk renovasi Kolam renang dengan konsep lebih terbarukan termasuk akan menambah fasilitas-fasilitas untuk menambah kebahagiaan tamu-tamu kami.

Sungguh merupakan kebahagiaan tersendiri bagi kami ketika bapak/ibu mengutarakan niat untuk kembali lagi ke hotel kami dilain waktu, kami berjanji untuk memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik untuk bapak/ibu dan keluarga.

Apabila Bapak/ibu membutuhkan bantuan dalam melakukan reservasi atau perihal yang lain, dengan senang hati kami akan membantu apabila bapak/ibu berkenan menghubungi kami atau saya sendiri di 263. 512503 / 512504.

Salam hormat,

text:
Dua minggu lalu, saya menghabiskan waktu dua hari satu malam dengan istri saya di Puncak Pass Resort. Saat itu kami memang membutuhkan tempat yang jauh dari hiruk pikuk Jakarta, benar-benar ingin melepas penat dan stress terhadap rutinintas kami. ternyata Puncak pass resort merupakan tempat yang sangat cocok untuk berlibur. Suasananya sangat nyaman, didukung dengan petugas hotel yang ramah dan cekatan, makanan hotel yang enak dan view yang sangat indah, ditambah lagi, lokasi ini tidak begitu jauh dari Jakarta. cuaca yang sangat tidak mendukung saaat itu, karena hujan sepanjang hari, tidak mengurangi kenyamanan untuk stay di sana. Hanya satu yang agak menggelitik pemandangan kami yaitu kolam renang yang kelihatannya tidak terawat. Sepertinya sudah lama tidak digunakan lagi. Alangkah baiknya jika kolam renang tersebut ditutup atau diganti taman yang lebih memanjakan mata para tamu.
BAgaimanapun juga, hotel ini benar-benar recommended dan kami akan kembali untuk menginap di Puncak pass Resort.

text:
Kami menginap 2 malam di hotel ini dalam rangka melepas penat di akhir pekan. Namun sayang sekali hotel bintang 4 ini selasarnya becek sekali karena tampias hujan. 
Selain itu juga akses menuju kamar tidak dipikirkan dengan baik. Sehingga yang satu harus melewati tangga outdoor yg jelas licin di waktu hujan dan curam, sementara akses lainnya melewati lobby samping yang sedang dalam masa renovasi akibat pernah kebakaran tahun lalu. Lobi samping ini sangat kotor dan becek penuh debu dan tidak layak untuk dilewati tamu tamu yang ingin menginap. Sungguh sangat buruk dan tidak layak untuk disebut sebagai hotel bintang 4. Kondisi kamar juga lantai parketnya menjadi kotor akibat selasar yang becek. Teras balkon juga sangat tampias sehingga view yang indah dan udara yang segar juga tidak bisa dinikmati. Sepertinya ada yang salah dengan perencanaan atap balkon daerah tropis. Libur akhir pekan menjadi tidak menyenangkan akibat hotel yang tidak nyaman.
Secara keseluruhan tempat ini sesungguhnya membutuhkan renovasi kelayakan dan  tampilan yang jauh lebih baik agar pantas menyandang gelar hotel bintang 4.
title: Hotel bintang 4 yang becek dan tidak layak

Kamar 101
1. Lantai kmr mndi licin, ada bekas air seni (kuning) di dudukan toilet. Air panas berfungsi baik.
2. Lantai kayu kusam dan kotor, jdi selama di kmr menggunakan sandal.
3. Msh ada sisa sampah dri penghuni sebelumnya di tong sampah bawah meja.
4. Kamar pencahayaannya nyaman.
5. Menu sarapan standart, nasi goreng, bihun tidak ada rasanya, omelet ngantri sampai kehabisan, akhirnya ga kebagian. Sendok, garpu, gelas kehabisan.

text:
Setiap kali kami mau berlibur ke puncak, selalu berpikiran hotel Puncak Pass adalah hotel tua yg tidak menarik, selain restaurant nya yg terkenal, tapi setelah kami berlibur saat long weekend yg lalu, penilaian kami langsung berubah total.

Seperti judul di atas, hotel ini walaupun sudah sangat lama, tapi masih bisa bersaing dengan hotel di sekitar puncak, karena lokasi hotel adalah the best spot in whole Puncak area. 
Pelayanan yg sangat ramah serta helpful dari staff hotel.
Jika menginap di hotel ini kita dapat benar2 merasakan alam dari Puncak, seperti kabut serta udara dinginnya. Selain bungalow, juga ada bangunan baru hotel bertingkat 3 yg modern dengan pemandangan gunungnya, sangat cocok untuk liburan keluarga, karena ada arena mini animal zoo, naik kuda.
Untuk makanan masih harus di tingkatkan lagi dari segi rasa, karena walaupun terkenal dgn pofferces puncak nya, rasa masakan yg lain masih pada level biasa saja, masih jauh dari cita rasa hotel berbintang. Banyak makanan Belanda nya yg masih jauh dari rasa Belanda...seperti kroket, earten soup, bitterbollen. Untuk lebih menjaga heritage daripada hotel, alangkah lebih baik jika memang makanan2 rasa Belanda nya bisa menyerupai aslinya dari segi rasa. 
Secara keseluruhan buat kami sekeluarga Puncak Pass Resort akan menjadi our favourit hotel in Puncak.

text: Saya dan keluarga besar (15 org) menginap di Puncak Pass Resort pd tgl 7-8 desember 2013, kami menyewa tipe family deluxe bungalow ( Soka dan Seruni )dgn fasilitas 2kamar, 1 kamar mandi, ruang keluarga kecil, perapian dan teras. Saat tiba disana proses check out berlangsung sangat cepat, kemudian dgn diantar bell boy kami menuju bungalow kami. Saat itu kabut sedang turun jd kami harus sangat hati2 berjalan menuju bungalow, karena jarak dari parkiran ke bungalow menanjak melalui tangga2 batu. Bell boy sangat sigap membantu membawakan barang2 kami. Saat tiba di bungalow ternyata extra bed dan handuk bersih belum diantar, tetapi tidak lama kemudian diantarkan ke bungalow kami. Kesan pertama saat masuk ke bungalow adalah : teras dan ruang keluarga yang tidak bersih, teras depan sepertinya tidak pernah di pel, bangku2 teras kotor tidak di lap, sofa di ruang keluarga bernoda dan kurang nyaman di duduki. Tetapi untuk kamar mandi dan tempat tidur cukup bersih. Pemandangan dari bungalow kami sangat indah dan sejuk dengan taman yang terawat dan rumput yang hijau. Saat sore anak2 berenang di kolam renang yang lokasinya lumayan jauh dari bungalow, kolam renang cukup nyaman dgn terpisahnya kolam anak dari kolam yg dalam, tetapi design kolam renang sangat kuno, ternyata menurut informasi dari pegawai hotel, bentuk kolam renang tidak pernah berubah dari tahun 1950an. Sehabis berenang anak2 main ayunan di play ground, dan menghabiskan sisa sore itu dgn duduk di bangku piknik di depan bungalow sambil makan cokelat. Sarapan banyak variasinya, ada egg station, menu prasmanan, juice, buah2an, roti, bubur ayam, dimsum dll. Pegawai restaurant juga sangat ramah, siap mengantarkan makanan yang kita pesan seperti omelet dan roti bakar. Sesudah makan pagi anak2 menyews kuda tunggang dengan biaya Rp.35,000.00 per kuda, mengitari area resort. Proses check out juga tidak lama, bahkan karena hujan kami diperbolehkan check out jam 1, bell boy juga dengan sigap membawakan payung dan barang2 bawaan menuju mobil. Keseluruhan kami sangat menikmati menginap di Puncak Pass Resort, hanya kebersihannya saja yang harus lebih diperhatikan.
title: Tempat yg sejuk dgn pemandangan indah

text: Resor ini terletak hampir di atas Puncak Pass dengan pemandangan yang indah. Area ini sejuk jika dibandingkan dengan Jakarta atau Bandung suatu perubahan yang menyenangkan. Kami menyewa 2 kamar vila untuk 2 malam di resor ini. Ini adalah observasi saya: Vila: - Cukup luas dengan ruang tamu dan ruang makan dan setiap kamar memiliki (berfungsi dengan baik dengan air panas) shower - LCD TV, lemari es dan pemanas air dan mikrowave tersedia. - Hanya ada 4 gelas dan 4 cangkir kopi. Kami berlima - Tidak ada piring atau alat makan di vila - Hanya 2 nescafe dan 2 kantung teh, kenapa tidak menaruh lebih banyak? - Handuk tidak cukup dan tercium sedikit 'tua' - Kami menayakan untuk selimut tambahan tapi harus bayar lebih untuk itu... Resor ini: -. Secara keseluruhan tetap bersih, taman yang cantik untuk berjalan-jalan - Taman Bermain usang tapi setidaknya ada satu dan cukup besar termasuk lapangan sepak bola - Kolam renang tidak dipanaskan dan benar-benar terlalu dingin untuk direnangi. Kolam renang anak-anak kotor dan air kolam renang utama tidak begitu jelas ... Restoran: - Sarapan adalah ok, mereka mempersiapkan omelet dan ada pilihan beberapa gulungan dan panas (Indonesia) makanan seperti Soto sup, ayam atau bubur ayam, jus dan kopi - Kami pergi untuk makan siang dan memerintahkan sup dan sate. Saya mengirim beras saya kembali seperti batu dingin. Rasanya enak. Saya melihat ada kelompok besar (bus wisata) dengan turis Belanda untuk makan siang. Mereka tetap mengeluh karena beberapa sudah dilayani sementara yang lain masih menunggu untuk makanan mereka (lebih dari 1 jam). Para staf sangat ramah tapi mereka sangat tidak efisien... - Mereka juga menyuguhkan mekanan Belanda seperti panekuk, poffertjes ( anda dapat 4 dan besar) dan bitterballen. Internet: - Wifi gratis tapi dengan performa yang buruk, hanya dapat digunakan untuk aplikasi chat saja. Harga: - Sekitar 150 Euro per malam, sangat mahal untuk Indonesia... dan terlalu mahal untuk tempat ini. Kesimpulan: Lokasi yang baik, tapi hari-hari emas mereka sudah berakhir dan perlu diperbarui lagi, terutama fasilitasnya. Tip: -Kunjungi Taman Safari yang terletak sekitar 30 menit. -Kuntungi Ciater untuk air panas dan Bogor

text:
We take junior suite with 2 room, locate inside the hotel (not villas and bungalows). It's an old room, so it looks old and a little bit dusty/dirty. Some of the furniture also need to be repaired; but overall the room is large and nice. 

The best part of the room and hotel is the mountain scenery. The main room has a huge windows so we can look directly to the mountain from inside the room. The balcony is quite big, you can even put small tent on it. Our favorite spot was on balcony, just relaxing with hot coffee and starring at the view lay in front of us. 

The mountain and hotel landscape view is beautiful and stunning, sometimes mountain fog will come down right in front of our room. The air is very refreshing.  Overall it's been a nice and refreshing vacation here.

Hotel service is ok, Check in process still a little slow and might need some improvement on the process. We have to wait almost 1 hour before our room is ready.
title: Nice resort with stunning mountain view

text:
We just spent 2 nights stay at Puncak Pass Resort in Junior Suite. The location of the resort is amazing and overall property and resort area is huge. Lot of places are there inside the resort where you can spend family time. The Junior Suite has a superb valley view and you are seeing the valley view from your master bedroom all the time. 

However, the resort seems to lack the regular cleaning and maintenance. Our master bedroom TV was not functioning properly. It used to take 10 mins to get ON. The service desk told us to keep it ON for that time to get it heated and then it used to start playing the TV channels. The wardrobe light was not switching OFF, and we got it fixed later on. When we entered the room we found that there were no hand towels given to us. Also the suite was not smelling fresh. So, these are some of the problems we faced. The swimming pool was under maintenance. Well, these are some of the smaller things that hotel management should look into to make the stay of their guests more comfortable. However, these are smaller things and we did not give that much importance to them.

Overall our experience in the resort was very good. They have a good mini animal zoo, where you can feed the animals and take photos with them. There is a horse ride also. 

The hotel has Free Wifi, but the speed is not that good. It depends where is your room located with respect to location of the router.

The breakfast was good but the variety was limited considering this is a 4 star hotel. Also, the cook at the Egg Counter was lacking skills and he was spilling the liquid egg allover. Luckily on 2nd day there was a better cook, who was managing the show better.

Taman Safari is just 1 hour drive. Other tourists attractions like paragliding, tea plantation, cibodas botanical garden, taman bunga nusantara are also close by.

This being a heritage hotel we wanted to stay here and we are quite happy with overall service and quality of our vacation.
title: Family Vacation at Puncak Pass Resort

text: My friends and I stayed at the Heritage Suite Villa for one night end of January 2017...It was raining, windy and foggy the whole time we were there and quite cold with the low temperature of 16 degrees Celcius. i do not recommend staying at this villa at all. The floor was quite dirty, the sofa was badly stained, the chairs in the kitchen were also stained...it was leaking during a heavy thunderstorm at night near the tv set so we have to move the tv to prevent it being soaked ! The toilets make stange gurgling sounds at night and smelled bad. I think this villa needs a thorough renovation before it can be sold to the public...it is really an embarrasment for the hotel. The balcony chairs were soaking wet due to the rain and we did not use it...there were puddles on the floor and in the car garage. No sandals were provided but luckily we brought our own sandals as our feet were black when we tried to walk barefoot. The only saving grace is the delicious breakfast and courteous, helpful staff.
title: My Stay at Puncak Pass Resort

text:
Stay here for a night with the big families. I could say that this resort paid sufficient attention to kids. They had these big green fields for soccer, the great small zoo in which the kids could play with hamster, birds, fed deers, rabbits, chicken, they could also see snakes, fish and turtles. We could also rent horses or horse carts. The amazing thing was also we could have photos while carrying a real crocodile! Unfortunately, the swimming pool was damaged and the kids pool was dirty.
The resort was located 3 minutes after the rindu alam restaurant and therefore the air was quite cold and it's a perfect climate for holiday for jakarta people.
Due to the heavy traffic, we could check in starting 7.30am which we appreciated so much as we were travelling with small children.
We used 4 villas and they were great, although the desain was pretty old (90's styles) but it was still acceptable. I have the believe that the price of the villas were a bit overrated compared to the market price in the surroundings.
The breakfast is OK, nothing really special.
Would definetely return, especially for discounted room rate
title: Great Resort For Kids

Sunshine over the mountain and golden sunbeam between the pines! Cold and fresh air so relaxing. We really enjoy our stay here, my son was happy to visit the animal zone here, in the afternoon we had a wonderful walk around the huge backyard. The restaurant is so lovely having the best view but the food is so so.. nothing special.
The staff is nice especially the housekeeping.
If you wish to get the stunning view so PPR is top notch!

text:
The resort is very beautiful located on the Puncak Pass.
This is a nice place to unwind.
The bungalows are located in a very well maintained garden and have beautiful sights over the landscape. The staff is very friendly. We had a good breakfast. The choice was good and the location on the terrace was nice.
The bungalow itself was just a bit to old. Sleeping in an old bungalow is not a problem at all. But the one and only thing i expect is cleanliness. The badroom was for example not fully tiled. There was an old wooden cabinet next to the sink. The tiling stopped where the closet was build. Between the sink and the closet there was a lose strip to cover the opening. When i wanted to brush my teeth i saw a big mice run away into the opening. The sink was al covered with mice dropping. Of course i phoned the reception and they immediately send two housekeepers to our room. The housekeeper equipped with a broom stayed in the bathroom for a minute or five. When they came out they told me it was probably a gecko. When i told that i actually saw the mouse they went in the badroom again for another five minutes. Of course a no chance mission. In the night we also heard a mice searching the bags in our bedroom. Of course we did not had any food with us. Itś not the first time being in a natural surrounding. That is why we do not even put garbage in the bin inside the bungalow. Just not to attract rodents. The next morning i went to the reception and told the story about the mouse, The receptionist could not believe that there were mice in the bungalow. She did not do anything with my remark and did not even called or noticed the manager. The point is when you pay more than 50 euro a night, you hope that when you have a complain at least somebody is telling you what is wrong and not just look the other way and let your housekeepers solve the problem.
Also booked the room because i like to swim on holiday. The pool looks old, big cracks and no water in it. Nothing mentioned when i booked... Why ?
title: Well located resort, unfortunately some irritations

resort location at top of the hills so the name is puncak pass with great view n also great landscape, we stay here 1 night (villa) with 2 bedroom, living room n pantry.  
front office staff n butler is polite n helpfull, interior n furnishing quite old but well maintained, bathroom clean n waterpressure quite Ok. Breakfast is great, they served with variety of menu western also sundanesse cuisine, restaurant with great view to pines forest surrounding resort, overoll it's good

text: A mixture of the fantastic and a little disappointing. We stayed in one of the bungalows which although they look quaint from the outside, need a lot of work done on them to bring them up to modern standards - certainly not 4 Star, although the new hotel building might well be. We were there only a few weeks after the Resort had suffered a major fire that destroyed their restaurant, and I must give full marks to the management and staff for relocating the restaurant to a temporary location. The staff were really excellent and friendly and they went out of their way to make us comfortable during our stay. The breakfasts were very good and their tender loin steaks were excellent. The location of this place makes it a very desirable place to visit with spectacular views, although you have to be aware that at holiday times and at weekends the police operate a one way traffic system for the movement of vehicles. If you get your timing wrong you could end up waiting a few hours in the famous 'macet', while vehicles are allowed 'up' the pass whilst those wanting to come 'down' have to wait, and vice versa. Having said all this I would definitely go back and stay at the resort, even if the actual accommodation was not quite up to scratch.
title: Two Day Trip to Puncak

text:
We stayed at Puncak Pass Resort for one night before a visit to Taman Safari Cisarua.  

I grew up in Indonesia but now live in the US. I had not been in Puncak area in more than twenty years. During the short visit, I wanted my American wife to get a taste of what it was like to come to Puncak for weekend getaways from Jakarta, and Puncak Pass Resort was one of the few places that still remained from the old days.

We stayed at a small bungalow that was comfortable and clean to stay in. It did not have some of the modern amenities or decor that one may expect from more contemporary hotel rooms, but I think that was exactly the point for staying at a ‘heritage hotel’. You want to experience the place somewhat like what it was years ago. The landscaping was very beautiful, and the atmosphere was quite peaceful — just like what I remembered from the old days coming there.

Our stay included breakfast buffet at the restaurant. Selection was pretty good — combination of Indonesian and western breakfast items, fresh fruits, and made-to-order omelette. We also ordered poppertjes on the side, as that was the dish that the place was known for.

Staff was courteous and helpful. Since the bungalow’s bedroom only has one queen bed and we had two extra people, we requested for extra bed, and those were set up for us right after we arrived.

I would recommend Puncak Pass for anyone coming to Puncak and interested in experiencing what it was like for people from Jakarta to go there for cooler weather / weekend getaways. It may not be for everyone, but certainly for us, it was a good choice, and I think we would’ve enjoyed longer stay there.
title: Nostalgic atmosphere, courteous staff, beautiful landscaping

The rooms are nice and modern, have foreign TV channels, with no aircons ..but outside is quite cool nearly 15-18 C at nights.Hotel food is good with nice choices but breakfast service is awful. Breakfast is a good spread of variety of food but once it finishes, then good luck! Generally though, service is nice..staff is helpful and polite. Did not test wifi...Good location overlooking a nice valley, good options for kids to play ..pool was not working (seems deep) but they have a playground and tennis court too...daytime can be hot under sun. Not much eating options around, you will need your own car to move around Puncak...Taman safari is about 10km away. oh one thing which we didn't like is their singer during nights...they play songs TOOOOO LOUD even for a small restaurant and lounge area (and management is not bothered even after asking to reduce it!) .. maybe they want to force people not to chat at all in nights ?? or just to shout over the music to talk to someone??

Overall, decent place for a weeknd stay and best part for us was that it was quite cool at nights, which is such a welcome change from Jakarta weather ... Weeknd traffic is horrific due to influx of people from Jakarta...can take 3-5 hrs to cover only 60kms..but we will return as we liked the place around usd 65 a night.

text:
This is a wonderful little heritage hotel. We stayed here for 2 nights in August 2015, in 2 Bungalow Executive Deluxe rooms. 

ROOM
The hotel is old but generally well kept. The rooms are spacious and clean. The beds especially are spotless. There is a wood fireplace in the room which we didn't use - closing the windows made it sufficiently warm to sleep in. Make no mistake - it's COLD at night in Puncak. Bring trackpants and a thick hoodie. We totally underestimated how cold it could get! Toilets are reasonably sized and reasonably clean. Basic amenities are provided, like shampoo, body wash, towels and toothbrushes. There is no bath mat. The hot water didn't run out. The one gripe I did have with the room was that the curtains were torn and had small bloodstains on it (probably the result of killing well-fed mosquitoes). The chairs also looked stained and dirty (even though it may well be that they were clean). We didn't sit on them. Those in my parents' room were cleaner so we used their room as the gathering point.

FOOD
The food at this hotel is excellent. Both their local and foreign fare is delicious and well-prepared. Their Sup Buntut in particular in a must-try. They also have a great breakfast spread. 
Special mention must be made of the fact that they are able to do a personalised barbecue for you in front of your chalet! The minimum is for 4 persons I believe. The package comes with fish, beef, chicken, sausages, a big bowl of fresh salad, potato wedges and stewed vegetables. A member of staff barbecues the meats for you so you don't have to lift a finger. They also provide you with soup and dessert. This was undoubtedly one of the best meals of our trip. It was ridiculously affordable too, for the quality of food and service provided.

GROUNDS
The hotel has huge sprawling grounds that are lovely to walk around in the cool Puncak air. The trees are lush and green, the air is clean, and you walk amidst flitting butterflies and chirping birds. If you've seen the opening of the old Disney Cinderella film, that's exactly what it felt like. There are 2 playgrounds (the old fashioned kind) that are functional but look old. We had great fun on the seesaws! It's also lovely to sit in the garden and read. Bring a picnic mat if you have the luggage space.

ACTIVITIES
We signed up for the tea plantation walk. Wear sensible covered shoes, like track shoes, for this, and slather on the sunblock. There's little shade in the plantation. The plantation itself is filthy underfoot but picturesque to look at. It doesn't belong to the hotel, but a member of staff will take you for a walk through the plantation. We met a few gigantic buzzing bees on the walk, so please don't bring any sweet smelling things with you or spray the sort of mosquito repellent that attracts bees (I know one brand offhand that's rumoured to repel mozzies but attract bees).
title: Fresh air, delicious food!

text:

I got chicken sate, with steamed rice, grilled veggies and sate sauce on the side ! So tasty ! 
Also, I would say it was bit expensive.. Paid 110.000IDR for the meal, a strawberry iced tea and service fees...
It still very cheap compared to European standard prices though! 
I recommend it!

Food & Beverage was quite disappointing. The buffet was quite limited and we did not have much and the kids are not able to consume any food from the counter except for the desserts. There was a "Gorengan" (Fried) station and I was tempted by the fritters but was told in a loud voice by a Manager in a Blazer that it was not included in the buffet. It was quite strange since the cost of it was not as high as a Salmon or Caviar. I even noticed waiters taking food with their fingers from the Chaffing Dishes at the buffet counters.Totally disgusting. Quite disappointed but meet Khairul who is the Duty Manager. He made preparation for us for the next dinner menu and he was quite attentive to the kids. The next 2 days of dinner was fantastic. 2 thumbs up for Khairul. Breakfast menu needs to have varieties. I asked for a change of friend noodles instead of Fried Rice and they just say it is not possible.  
Advice: Hoping that the Children Playground especially the swing could be look into. It is on a concrete based and if kids fell down it would cause serious injuries especially to the head.

text: Stayed here from 2nd June 2015 to 5th June 2015. I have read all the comments before deciding my stay here. Though there are lots of negativity about this resort. I would like to say this resort is not for those who are rushing for time. It is a resort people, it is a placed to relax and enjoy the fresh cool air and the scenic view. It is actually an hour's drive if there is no traffic jam from Jakarta airport. Luckily I have a good driver who would go by small little roads. If there is a lot of traffic, it would take like 3 to 4 hours jam. That depends on the time of going to the resort.  The staff was fantastic, guards was always patrolling at night. So, I really feel secure. They should actually have a safe box for tourists. The wifi is only available at resort lobby. These are the only downside. Nevertheless, it is a superb resort with a beautiful view. Especially in the morning and coming dawn. Food wise at the Molinari Café was actually very good and I just love them. I informed them they should put more things in the menu. Everything when very well as this is my first time travelling to Indonesia. I would like to thanks the management and especially to Qoyyum, I believe he is one of the reception there. He have help me to find a good driver and he was the one who made our stay one of our most memorable vacation ever for my whole family . Will come back and stay at this resort if I were to ever return back. This is good for families, especially young families with small children.
title: Superb resort with a splendid view. Staff was friendly and approachable.

text: For healing, puncak pass resort one of many place was a right choice, we always choice romm number 307 or 308 in bungalows names dahlia or kemuning. And the taste of food all delicious, meat of steak is very tender..excellent. My advice for this resort is not to throw away the existing cats, they only need leftover food from your kitchen, and will not disturb guests, some children are happy with cats, birds.
title: Resort for the best healing.

text:
1500 meters above sea level. Chilly, quiet, old, still the best view in Puncak. 

This place goes back to 1928, got renamed in 1955 & throughout managed to stick to their classic wooden style, vintage in today's term, but clean & cozy.

Hollandse Poffertjes & Pannekoek 'Puncak Pass' is their signature dish. We stayed at the superior room, spacious, nice terrace, hot water works.
title: 1500 meters above sea level.

text: legendary hotel, maintains its heritage, we tried room 308, the view is valley and mountain, soothing to the eyes. while drinking tea and coffee sitting on the terrace feeling the cool, cold air and fog while watching the fog move in the air. Unfortunately, access to traffic is very jammed, this sometimes makes it lazy to go to the top.
title: heritage hotel with beautiful view, with delicious food.

text:
Disappointing Services

For the so often time, I decided to book a night qt Puncak Pass Resort. Why? Because I like the place and service.

But this time I am disappointed. 

I ordered room service at 6.30 pm and told that the food can only be delivered in 30-45 minutes. I was willing to wait. At about 7.30pm I call the room service and was told that the food I ordered had been delivere and on the way to our villa. At 8.30pm, the food still had not arrived. I called the room service and nobody dare to pick up the phone. I call the front desk and the same. I called using my mobile to the reception and it was picked up. I made a complain and immediately, the room service picked up my call. And you know what? The food had not been delivered!!! It only arrived my villa at 9pm and the kids were too hungry till they have a pain in their stomach. The sop buntut arrived ice cold!!!! This is Puncak Pass Resort???
title: A disappointment

text:
So after checking out at Pesona Alam, we checked in here.

Cold weather (my favourite), nice villa. We stay in the suite. Food was superb..

Setback? They light the fireplace in my villa, whole room was full of smoke. And... they should place bars (teralis) on the windows. We need fresh air when we want to sleep and we have dilemma. If we open the windows, people can sneak inside our villa. If we close the windows, it became warm. So we did not get enough sleep as we open the windows and we feel insecure.. please do something about this as we will be coming back soon.
title: A short break number 2

text: 20-30 years ago, this restaurant was very famous for its porperjies, until now I think it's still the same. The taste of the food is stable until now (still delicious). Besides the taste, the atmosphere here is very selling because it is located at the top of the mountain. not boring.
title: classy restaurant with a natural feel

text: I think it's better to just go to this hotel for their heritage snack (so good !) and go to their private pine forest for little hiking. The hotel room is standard, not sound proof, no facilities. When we stayed here, the pool is closed/under renovation. Hot water is not available most of the time, it's a problem when you stay in a very cold weather like Puncak Pass. But if you got very cheap price (like me) then no problem, just don't expect to much.
title: Average hotel, good view & location

text: For this accommodation do not go by the 3,4 and 5 star reviews as they are lies. 1 and 2 stars are the honest truth much to my dismay. No swimming pool that is advertised on website and the kids pool is an honest death trap. Not clean, mildew surrounding it that was that slippy that much that my wife fell and was 6inches away from splitting her skull open. Son then slipped while walking and again almost ended up in hospital. When we went to reception to chat with manager it was very clear he had no interest and didn't give a damn. Just nodded his head like a nodding donkey. Accommodation very old and dated, not clean, rooms and sheets smell. Restaraunt staff and people serving had same dont give a damn attitude as the manager. Food was very very poor. I was left standing waiting 10 minutes on a table being cleared, then had to call them back to wipe and disinfect as they ignored that... even with covid on the go. Then stood waiting on food, then stood waiting on a coffee cup. Priority is definitely given to visiting restaurant guests and definitely not paying resort guest's. This place, like the paying guests, has been left neglected by all running the place but the buck stops at the manager.
title: Very Poor Resort

text: We have stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. We enjoyed beautiful view from our room (family deluxe). It's really an excellent mountain view. The location is very close to some restaurants and shops. The staff are friendly and helpful. Five stars for this hotel/resort.
title: Excellent view and stay
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Always asked for the check out time and the late check out fee. Because it is sad when you had planned your activities based on your late check out time but it turned out that they asked you to check out at the normal hrs because you haven't paid the fee (which you did not recieved any information before). However the over all service was good, nice room, friendly staffs (except the lady handling the check out reminder that I found very rude and does not seems to know how to apologize), nice breakfast, good food.
title: Be careful of your check out time
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Big turn on : fast check-in & check-out service, well maintaned resort, variable delicious food and geographical location. Turn off : there was no security services when it comes with going inside the hotel from Cipanas direction (lack of initiatives), there were no towels and telephone connection when we checked-in so we need to ask and request. Overall it was a nice stay, when classic resort meets nice environment. They need to improve its hospitality & facilities though.
title: Vintage & Nostalgic

text: Nice place. Comfort bedding with latex pillow. Equipped with coffee maker and a comfort sofa. Really chill weather especially during the morning. Room has no aircon since it's already cold inside out. The hot shower running well, but the drainage system in my room (201) really bad. The water puddling while you had shower till it flooded outside the shower room to the bathroom floor, it makes less comfort for your bathing experience. The cleanliness of the room is ok. Seems like every room has balcony with view of nature (but recently it disturbed by the construction work right in front of the room view). The breakfast was great and tasty, but you need to walk and hike a bit heading to the restaurant which is in a different building. The cafe at side of the hotel's entrance has a good view. They also serve a delicious italian hot chocolate, great to have during the cold afternoon.
title: One of the good hotel around Upper Cianjur Regency

text:
After visiting the unusual archaeological site Gunung Padang, four hours drive from
Karyamukti village, Cianjur, or 180km from Jakarta, we had a late lunch at this charming resort. Seated at a table on the balcony it was fresh and we had a good view of the lush valley below. We had a reservation and the dishes just kept coming. I cannot even begin to describe the various Indonesian dishes except to say that they were all delicious. This resort is in the mountain and the weather was cool when we visited. I am glad I brought a jacket. But I am also glad we could cool off after the hot temperature at lower elevation. This is an excellent place to stop on the way to or from Gurung Padang. Better yet, spend a few days at Puncak Pass Resort.
title: A cool and exotic place to dine or sleep

text: For small group you can take the room in the main building. Larger group take the bungalow located at lower ground level. Have to know the one way traffic schedule in Puncak. Otherwise you will stuck for hours waiting.
title: Good place for escape the city

text:
The Puncak Pass Resort was first opened under a different name back in 1928. It has been renovated over the years, but still maintains the feel of a mountain lodge. (There is road work going on right now next to the hotel to repair a landslide. However we were not particularly bothered by it.) My wife and I enjoyed our large and clean room, the helpful staff, the delicious food (we had breakfast each morning and dinner twice). The cool air of Puncak was also nice. 
The only disappointment in the area (and this is not a reflection on the hotel itself) is that the air was not clean and fresh. There was a lot of pollution in the region, we suppose due to the relatively heavy traffic. We had expected to find blue skies and fresh air. However, sadly that was not the case. Even so, we really enjoyed our time at Puncak Pass Resort and recommend it to you.
title: A gem in the highlands

text: Stay in this hotel because of another better hotel were fullbooked. The parking lots were not have enough space. The reception was looking so difficult in handling new guests, because of only her in reception desk when we're arrived! But she still have good smile and attitude in handling new guests eventhough we know that she already tired. Got the last room with no view (in 1st floor). First survey, the room was smelling so bad and dusty. Maybe because of this hotel still in renovation so the ambiences were bad. Got welcome drink that take time so long to be served. The swimming pools were very poor and bad. Kids pool was dirty and the water was so cold (because of the fresh cold air and there was no any water heater for the pool). We wouldn't let our kids to swim in there! Another pool was on renovation and looked very spooky. The hotel need to change their towels, their cups were full of Coffee/tea stains, and need to fix their way in washing the cutlery (sum have foods stain that already dried). And the water heater in room didn't run well especially in the middle of nite till morning! The services in resto when breakfast were really dissappointing!Especially from the eggstall, the middle aged or old chef that really have no smile n nice attitude! Supposed to be he listened the requests from the guests hotel about how the eggs were made and/or how many eggs were requested by the guests! Such he had a power to determine how many eggs every guest might have for the breakfast! Just like he made a restriction of quantity. And he didn't listen the request eventhough i already asked for 3rd time. This is for the first time i found the service like this since i'd already travelling mostly around domestic indonesia n sum another country. I would NOT RECOMMEND this hotel to my colleagues, family or maybe my office events/meetings if this hotel still not make any improvement. Eventhough, still this hotel was surrounded with fresh cold air especially in the morning. But other hotels with better services, rooms, breakfast and in equal price will be my choice next time! Thanks Puncak Pass Resort for the EXPERIENCE that make us would NOT HAVE ANOTHER STAY or Well RECOMMEND! First stay and for the last stay.

text:
The place has great vibes as soon as you enter it.. you see a fine restaurant with a nice view. Reception was a small but efficient and check-in was pretty quick.
The room which we booked "Junior Suit" was fantastic, nicely decorated, ample of space and great view from the balcony & the main bedroom. It also had a living area with sitting and dining arrangements, a small kitchenette with mini bar, kettle for tea coffee & microwave(which came in very handy as we had small kid in the group.)  and a second bedroom, with both rooms having an en-suite bathroom.
However when we went for dinner later in the evening, the service was lackluster.. but in observation it was not because of the lack of motivation of staff, but mainly due to 2 reasons, 1. shortage of staff 2. inadequate training. if the hotel management can work on these 2 issues it would definitely help improve customer experience.
Next day we had a breakfast at their  2nd restaurant under the sun(which was awesome), the choices were good but mostly Indonesian food,perhaps because most guest are locals.
next we explore rest of the property(which was quite big actually), play ground with football, tennis and voleibol courts, adult(under renovation) and kids pool. Also they had some animal enclosures, but most of them were under renovation, however we did feed some deer and saw a lonely crocodile.
They also offer private vilas & bungalows.
overall a present stay, we would stay there again and would definitely recommend it.
title: Beatuful Estate, But service needs to improve.

text:
This is an old hotel resort but well maintained.
Located on the top of Puncak area, so the view was superb.
They have 2 restaurants, one is serving western food (try their poffertjes, it's very famous) and the other is for breakfast. Both restaurant have nice ambience and great view.

The room was old but still clean & comfy enough. We had trouble with electric key and the technician came a few minutes later to fix it.
The staff response need improvement though. We need to call twice before the technician came. And the front desk was not very friendly. We came a little bit early and they promised to call us when our room ready. But until 2.30 pm they didn't call, so we have to come and ask again about our room.

Hot water doesn't work well, during busy hour it's only a little warm, not hot at all.
The bed and pillow was comfortable and clean. We had a good sleep during our visit.
We also like the terrace, it's big enough to sit and relax. Perfect place for sipping hot coffee or tea while watching the fog came down from the hills.

Breakfast served at Mahoni Restaurant. It's very good with various type of food. Unfortunately they don't serve hot soup (only chicken porridge). Hot soup would be perfect for a cool morning at the Puncak.

Swimming pool for adult was under maintenance when we visit. But swimming at the cool place like Puncak maybe not everyone's favorite.
Beside swimming pools and horse riding, there's nothing more to see or to do in this resort. Adding some activity (hot jacuzzi, flying fox, pond for canoeing, small rabbit farm for children, etc) would be good.

Overall, this resort is a little bit expensive, but it's worth it.
title: Old Legendary Resort

text:
It is still my favorite place in Puncak, just to have a cup of coffee and poffertjes with friends and family.
Old place, relative well maintained ... Feels the same after so,many years (decades) ... Bring a lot of old memories :-)
Food and and drinks are ok, you can western / Dutch food, and Indonesian food there ... All are good (can't say supperb as as they still relay with their old recipes ... :-) could be good could be bad depend on how you see it :-)

Hotel? The old sections are nicer (for me), some people prefer the new hotel section (more modern). Problem is the standard of cleanliness ... Still much below the same rate hotel in Jakarta, or even affordable chain hotel such as novotel, Aston, ibis ... Once this settled, this hotel is certainly the must hotel to spend your weekends ...!!!
title: Amazing heritage hotel and,restaurant

My compliment also for one of the senior staff who entertained my daughter with origami. Great service!
 I hope in the future some new management will take over and relive the greatness of this place again.

text:
<1 Pm >
Imagine that you arrive there and in your balcony you see and hear tractor is working nearby. (for me it still ok as long as I can sleep at night). After that I walk around the resort, The gazebo is dirty, swimming pool without water… frankly speaking this is a resort without any facility for me….
After that I go out driving around puncak

<9 pm >
 I arrive and take a bath.. and I can hear someone karaoke so loud in the hotel bar and the tractor still working… so I call the hotel staff about this issue
Me: Hi, the karaoke sound in the bar and tractor is so loud…
Staff :  the one that karaoke is not stay at the hotel, they might be go back early.. and the tractor will stop at 10 pm…

<9.30 pm>
I call the hotel receptionist again
Me: I the karaoke is very loud.. can you please do something…
Staff: Ok. I will go to check

<9.45 pm>
Me: there is no change with the karaoke sound!!
Staff : Oh, I thought my other friend had make the sound smaller. Now he had go back. I will go to check.

<10 pm>
Me: Can I talk to your manager.
Staff: Yes, he will go to your room soon.

<10.15 pm>
The manager come and ask to come inside my room to make sure the sound is loud… and after he came in and I close the door, he agree that the sound from the karaoke is loud.

<10.30 pm>
Finally the karaoke sound had stop. And there is no staff that ask me "if everything is ok already.."

I need to call 4 times to solve this karaoke problem and it takes 1.5 hours. Great…

Then I go to sleep…

<7 AM in the morning>
The tractor had start working again… 

but i like to say the resto is quite good..
title: Worse hotel ever

text:
I stay for 2 night with my lovely wife. First impresssion with this hotel was very good. The reception staff was very friendly. I stay in superior room with balcony and astonish mountain view. Little problem with the toilet flush that can not working properly, but hotel staff gave quick respond to fix it. During our second night stay, we are trying to order some food by calling room service. But no one respond, so we must go out to the restaurant to make some order. At that time the restaurant staff was very busy serving the guest, so maybe no one heard our telephone calling. Luckly we have no problem with the food, the taste was average good and arrive on time in our room.
Overall I think this hotel was giving good service, with some minor problem that need to be improved. I recommend this hotel as one of the best service hotel in Puncak, Bogor area.
Tips:
1. Pay attention to Puncak area traffic arrangement, specially for weekend. Otherwise you can stuck in very heavy traffic jam! You can find the traffic info on their website.
2. Advance booking are required, because the room are always fully booked during weekend.
3. Don't forget to bring your sweater, the weather is very cold at night.
4. Have a great stay. ;-)
title: Heritage hotel with friendly staff

text:
Puncak pass resort offers stunning view, good service but their rooms should be improved. 
We arrived at the resort pretty late at night and was pleased that the manager was able to converse with great english. We stayed in the Bungalow Family Deluxe consisting of 2 Bedrooms with a bathroom each. One room had 2 single bed and the other had a queen sized bed. 

Firstly, we had dinner at the Waringin Restaurant, just beside the resort reception. Overall their food were too salty. Especially the grilled chicken that we ordered.

As the bungalow we stayed at was quite far from the reception, we were at first shocked when we were told to walk to our room with all our traveling baggage so late at night after dinner.. So we requested and they got a mini van to fetch us to our bungalow..

Disgusted that my bed had strands of hair and the pillows were very old with stains inside. Towel had a very unpleasant smell. Wifi signal was poor on my first night but was improved on the second day after informing the hotel staff. The sofa was also very uncomfortable as the cushion kept sliding out.
 
Breakfast was rather medicore. I liked their fried omelet and porridge.  But of course with the stunning view of lush greenery, well cared gardens what more could you ask for.

Do take a 15 min walk out of the resort to a tea plantation called perak.teh.ciliwung. Admission was 3000Rp per person. And it's better to wear trekking shoes up as road can get uneven.. Had dinner at the restaurant opposite the tea plantation called rindu alam and was able to witness the stunning sunset!!
I enjoyed my stay and really love the cooling climate in puncak!
title: Stunning view

text:
I stayed here twice, 3 days 2 nights in 2 different bungalow suites, on separate occasions. It's not the typical high end bungalows but still comfortable. Both experiences were great, loved the place right away. It only takes around 2 hours to get here from Jakarta, but avoid peak season and public holidays as it's always full and a traffic nightmare. But other than that, great views, cool weather, nice rooms with fireplace, friendly people and good food. The first time was with family and the second time was with my partner. They all loved it.
There were plenty to do and see around the area, the highlight would be the Safari, one of the best I've ever been to, other activities you can try - picking strawberries or just buy them at the Strawberry farms, check out the nice restaurants with great local food, enjoy the botanical gardens and do a little bit of shopping - the fresh local produce or hand crafted souvenirs. 
You can feel the fresh air around you, the overall atmosphere is just great and you can either spend your time walking, enjoying nature...or just grab your favorite book, sit next to the fireplace, sip your wine and enjoy a good read. Totally relaxing and nostalgic.
title: Vintage nostalgia vacation

text:
My husband and I wanted to go for a night retreat and decided to stay at Puncak Pass Villa. I know this place well as I have been many times come just to have their famous Dutch Poffertjes since I was a teenager, but never had the chance to stay over there. 

When we arrived, we were politely greeted by the staff and escorted to our villa. Our villa was already well prepared complete with a personalized welcome letter by the General Manager, Pak Joko. We were given a 2-bedroom villa located at far end of the complex which made us really happy as we don’t want to get any disturbance during our stay, the staff understood well we wanted privacy. We were much impressed with the place, the natural view, the fresh air we breathe in and most importantly its cleanliness; it was surely a five star hygiene standard. With the cold puncak weather at night, we light up the fire in the fireplace in the living room accompanied by their famous Poffertjes and hot chocolate. The complex area was really quiet there was no noise nor disturbance... seemed like no one was there but us… we could only hear the sound of the nature… and we felt so peaceful to stay there…

Both my husband and I were really happy with the experience and surely will come back again, we’re glad that we stayed there to know that there is a nice place just 1,5 hours drive from Jakarta we can easily go to.

Yanti Subianto Zorlu
title: Great retreat just 1,5 hours drive from Jakarta

text: We find this is the only option really in a range of quite mediocre offerings in the Indonesian hills.  There are a variety of rooms and villas all with fireplaces which we love.  We have stayed with friends in Mawar Cottage, which has two double rooms and a fireplace.  The location is perfect, accessible to the Botanical Cibodas and Taman Bunga gardens.  You can walk around the extensive property.   We found the food very very good the first time we stayed but markedly less so the second time, which is a pity. Try the poperfjies (small Dutch hot cakes) which are first class. Seriously, you won't do better than this up in the hills. The staff are really great, well trained at setting fires in the fireplaces and looking after you.
title: Cosy hills retreat

Das Hotel ist schon in die Jahre gekommen, was man an den Zimmern merkt. Die tolle Lage in den Bergen mit vielen Teeplantagen hat aber dafür entschädigt. Das Essen war gut und von Holland inspiriert, das das Hotel früher von Niederländern erbaut wurde. Wir wollten Paragliden, aber leider hat das Wetter nicht mitgespielt. Ansonsten wäre der Preis dafür hier oben unschlagbar günstig.
